pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:0.5: 58. The training rule on the instruction
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country at Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.2: the monks from the group of six went to the nuns’ dwelling place and instructed the nuns from the group of six.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.3: Soon afterwards other nuns said to the nuns from the group of six,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.4: “Come, Venerables, let’s go to the instruction.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.5: “There’s no need; the monks from the group of six came and instructed us right here.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.7: “How can the nuns from the group of six not go to the instruction?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that nuns didn’t do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.11: “… How can the nuns from the group of six not go to the instruction?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.14: ‘If a nun does not go to the instruction or take part in formal meetings of the community, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.8: common legal procedures, a joint recitation, the same training—this is called “community”.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.9: If she thinks, “I won’t go to the instruction or take part in formal meetings of the community,” then by the mere fact of giving up the duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.3: if she searches for a companion nun, but does not find one;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.8: The eighth training rule is finished.
